Endpoint.Name: Upload Dataset
Endpoint.Description: Uploads a dataset to the platform for further processing and analysis.

dataset_file.Description: The dataset file to upload. Supported formats include CSV, JSON, and Parquet.

dataset_name.Description: The name of the dataset being uploaded.

description.Description: A brief description of the dataset.

visibility.Description: The visibility level of the dataset: PUBLIC or PRIVATE.

200.Description: Successful response with details about the uploaded dataset.

dataset_id.Description: The unique identifier for the uploaded dataset.

status.Description: The status of the upload process.
